snippet: Olivia Chow, a left-leaning politician, resigned from Parliament this week to open her campaign to replace Rob Ford in the election set for October.
abstract: Left-leaning Canadian politician Olivia Chow says she has opened campaign to replace Toronto Mayor Rob Ford; Ford remains confident he will win reelection despite his acknowledged use of crack cocaine.
lead_paragraph: Olivia Chow, a left-leaning politician, resigned from Parliament this week to open her campaign to replace Rob Ford in the election set for October.

headline.main: Toronto’s Mayor Is Challenged on the Left
headline.print_headline: Toronto’s Mayor Is Challenged on Left
